DOC.brief_summary: Assess the impact in outcome of the use of zoledronic acid in multiple myeloma.
DOC.brief_title: Stem Cell Transplant and Zoledronic Acid Improve Outcome in Previously Untreated Patients With Multiple Myeloma
DOC.detailed_description: Assess if the use of zoledronic acid can improve outcome in patients with multiple myeloma whose are treated with cytoreductive therapy and stem cell transplant.
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis of multiple myeloma No previous treatment Symptomatic High risk (ISS) or stage III ( DurieSalmon) No severe comorbidities Pregnancy HIV + Refuse treatment
